comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: Terrific picnic shot, takes me back a few years to a time when picnics were the highlight of our summer.  Now its foreign travel and bungee jumping:-)  Well done to Allan Godby for these shots, they are a great representation of the times!

comment.author: 95711690@N03
comment._content: There are a lot of accounts of picnics in the mountains in the publications about life in the Coal Branch.  It must've been pretty heavenly.
